RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL GRANDE O showed good speed on the outside then moved clear leaving the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path, responded well when asked near the quarter-pole then came under a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, was put to a left-handed crop just inside the furlong marker and held under strong urging. JIMMYTHETOOTH showed speed on the inside of a foe then dropped back leaving the backstretch, moved from the rail to the three path on the turn, re-engaged the leader late on that bend, lost touch with that rival under a drive in upper stretch and was outfinished while well clear for the place. PERLIANO chased the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path, spun three wide into upper stretch and weakened while able to get the show. SKYLER'S STARSHIP was restless in the gate then broke slow, spotted the front a few lengths, was urged along on the outside, went four then five wide on the turn and failed to threaten. SPECIALAGENTJONSON broke a half-step slow then dropped back under urging, went three then four wide on the turn and capitulated. DISCO PREACHER broke a bit slow, was urged along near the back, went around the turn in the two to three path, bumped with a foe near the furlong marker and was no factor. BALI AMOUR broke a half-step slow then dropped back, saved ground on the turn, had the rider hit the rail with a left-handed crop in upper stretch, bumped with an opponent near the furlong marker and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmythetooth
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed ins foe,drop back 1/2,chased ins-3p turn,bid5/16,outfinishd

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Amour
ENTRY.OWNER: Whylie Herold O and Reid Sanchez J
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2stp slw,drp bck,ins trn,crop hit rail3/16,bmp1/8,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Perliano
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,2path turn,3path into lane,weakened,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Disco Preacher
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,urged near back,2-3path turn,bmpd1/8,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Specialagentjonson
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 step slow,dropped back,urged,3-4w turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: El Grande O
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside,clear1/2,2path turn,asked1/4,responded,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Skyler's Starship
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, ridden along outside, 4-5wide turn, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 6F Inner turf CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. INNER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S FIRE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, took the inside route into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held clear to prevail kept to task. PERMED broke forwardly placed albeit stumbling at the break churning the ground until holding balance a few strides into the race, chased just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, offered up a mild kick to chase the winner home willingly along for the place honors. DR. RAY D. coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. SEA DANCER chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. SMOOTH WAVES coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but was outfinished. GOATS ON A TREE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, improved position by tired foes. ISN'T SHE KHOZY chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. GREAVETTE chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened. HIDDEN SPIN chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued three wide for home and made no impact. TALAVERA broke in at the start, chased two to three wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, angled five wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Talavera
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Waves
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, bid, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: She's Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, 2p turn, ins 1/4, edged away, held clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Bill Adair, Phyllis Adair & Connie Brown

ENTRY.NAME: Permed
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbling st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, ran on, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Isn't She Khozy
ENTRY.OWNER: Laderer Amanda Rivas Dianette and Fox Martin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Goats On a Tree
ENTRY.OWNER: Gold Square LLC Hardoon Joseph R and D'Angelo Jose Francisco
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Ray D.
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Sea Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Spin
ENTRY.OWNER: Hidden Brook Farm and Denholtz Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Greavette
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment D ue At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALLELUJAH was urged along on the outside, went four wide on the turn, rallied late on that bend, closed well to make a bid in upper stretch, took the lead inside the furlong marker, led into the final sixteenth and just held off the runner-up under strong urging. OK HONEY was hustled from the gate then ridden along off the pace, went three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed well to just miss while able to get the place. SECURITY CODE acted-up at the start then was away awkwardly and taken up, spotted the front a few lengths, was urged well off the pace, saved ground on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, moved out into the final furlong and finished willingly for the show. FANCY JOKE bumped with a rival at the start, dueled on the inside of a foe while along the rail, dropped back coming to the half-mile pole then switched to the two path, chased in the two path through the turn, took the lead in the three path into upper stretch, led under threat from the winner into the final furlong then lost the advantage, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened. SILVER FIST broke in and bumped with a foe, dueled on the outside of that rival, moved clear nearing the half-mile pole then dropped from the two path to the inside, lost the lead in the two path into upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong, moved out outside the sixteenth-pole and tired. HAPPY SOPHIA settled behind the leading duo, was asked in the three path on the turn and lacked the needed response. BACKED BY GOLD was urged along at the rear, saved ground on the turn, came off the rail under the crop in upper stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Sophia
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,behind due,asked 3wide turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ridden along,3wide turn,4w1/4,closed well,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Backed by Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC and Jacoutot Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear, saved ground, moved out 3/16, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Joke
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,duel ins,drp bck1/2,mvd out,2p,3p,led3/16-1/8,ovrtkn,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,duel outside,clr2p1/2,rail,headed 2p3/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Security Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: acted-up brk,awkward,tkn up,urged,ins turn,mvd out1/8,up show

ENTRY.NAME: Vallelujah
ENTRY.OWNER: East Ave Racing Stable and Sisu Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,4wide turn,rallied,lead ins1/8,all out,held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUNDAESWITHSANDY established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside, tipped to the two path through the turn and was let out continuing just off the inside into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held well to prevail. SHADOW DRAGON chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. PRINCE OF PHAROAHS prompted the pace of SUNDAESWITHSANDY from the outside three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. BIG BOBBY coaxed from the gate, chased four to five wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, lost ground and continued four to five wide into upper stretch and was eased home through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 7/16, 4-5w upper, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Sundaeswithsandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, 2p turn, let out 2w 1/4p, edged away, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Pharoahs
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Morrison Matthew J and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THANK YOU JON showed good speed from the outside, moved clear in the three path with a half-mile to run then dropped to the two path, responded well when asked at the top of the stretch, drew off into the final furlong, was put to a left-handed crop at that point, widened into the final sixteenth then was eased up while much the best. NOBILIS dropped back while urged along, went around the turn in the two path, swung five wide into the stretch and improved for the place. TWIRLING VINE chased the pace down the backstretch, went four then three wide on the turn and weakened then lost the place while clear for the show. CHALKY CAT bumped with an opponent at the start, was urged early then settled off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch, moved from the rail to the three path on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch and failed to rally. ALPHA SONNY bumped with a foe at the start, showed speed under urging then pressed the pace, dropped in leaving the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and tired. LOOKIN' TO WIN bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along off the pace, went three then four wide on the turn, slipped past the injured foe without incident at the three-eighths and failed to threaten. TIP OF THE BOOT dropped back on the inside then moved out near the five-eighths, went three wide early on the turn, moved five wide to go around an injured foe nearing the three=eighths, continued five wide into the stretch and was no factor. SEIZE THE CITY bumped with a rival at the start, showed speed then was well placed just off the pace, traveled in the two path under urging on the turn, suffered an injury to his left foreleg outside the three-eighths pole and was pulled up then vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Tip of the Boot
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back inside,mvd out 5/8,3-5wide turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Nobilis
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,urged along,2path turn,5p1/4,up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Seize the City
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,well placed,urgd 2p trn,injurd outside3/8,pulld up,vanned

ENTRY.NAME: Chalky Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urged early,settled,drop back9/16,ins-3p,4p1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin' to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urged along,3-4wide turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Alpha Sonny
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,speed,urged along,mvd in 9/16,inside turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4-3path turn, weakened, lost place

ENTRY.NAME: Thank You Jon
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside speed,clear 1/2,3-2p turn,drew off,eased up 1/16

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dutchess Views Farm, Inc., SGOThoroughbred LLC & Winding R

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 7F Turf CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void ). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRING ME A CHECK chased inside briefly before being taken hold of and tipped to the two path five and a half furlongs out as SENBEI took to the inside in front, advanced to press that rival from the outside coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive dueling through the stretch to the finish and gamely inched away inside the final seventy yards to score. SENBEI established the front and showed the way briefly from the two path before tucking inside with five and a half furlongs to run, came under increasing pressure from the top one through the turn and was placed to coaxing in response nearing the quarter pole, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in dueling through to the finish in game fashion but was ultimately collared with seventy yards to the finish and denied at the end and had the rider lose the handle on the crop to the inside in the final steps to the wire. MAXWELL ESQUIRE chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled out four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid to secure the show honors. PINE KNOLL three wide in aim early on latched on the top pair, eased off those rivals five furlongs from home and chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and kept on one paced to the finish. PAROS broke outwards brushing the off side stall at the start, chased two to three wide under a ride from three furlongs out, swung four wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. AFTER FIVE chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Bring Me a Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins briefly, tp 2p 5 1/2, pressed 2p, 2w 1/4p, dueled str, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: After Five
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC and Jacoutot Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Paros
ENTRY.OWNER: Franco Marianne Zoitos Lorette and Zoitos Dennis
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Senbei
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing and Bilinski Darlene
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p early, to ins 5 1/2, ins under pressure, dueled str, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Maxwell Esquire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Pine Knoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, one paced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 1 1/4M Inner turf CR: 86. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. INNER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRULY QUALITY went around the first turn in the two path, settled comfortably in third position, gained on the leader in the three path on the far turn, made a bid at the quarter-pole, took the lead under a drive in upper stretch, drifted in while moving clear inside the furlong marker and proved best under steady urging. FLY RIGHT was hustled to the front then went clear early, rounded the opening bend in the two path, showed the way with a clear advantage, opened up more outside the five-eighths pole, vied inside to the two path on the far turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, lost the lead to the winner in upper stretch, fought with that foe into the final furlong and was outfinished while just able to get the place. SWORE went four then three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused in the two path on the final turn and finished willingly to just miss the place while well clear for the show. HEADLINE NEWS traveled three wide on the first turn, settled in fourth position, was asked in the three path on the far turn and failed to rally. NOSTALGIC ONE was hustled from the start then angled in early, saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear, went around a stopping foe in the two path early on the far turn then dropped back to the rail and failed to threaten. WHENLOVETAKESOVER went two to three wide on the turns and failed to respond. FLUORESCENT BAY went five then four wide on the first turn, settled well off the pace, was urged three wide on the far turn and also failed to respond. MUGSY FURY was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, raced a bit eagerly early, saved ground on the first turn, settled off the pace, moved from the rail to the three path on the far turn and capitulated. LOCKE AND KEY went around the first turn in the three path, stalked the pace on the outside, came up empty late on the backstretch and retreated then was eased in the stretch then vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Fury
ENTRY.OWNER: Furey III Charles and Davis Marguerite
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,bit eager,ins1st,settled,ins-3w2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Fluorescent Bay
ENTRY.OWNER: Davis Edmund D King Donald F and Davis Marguerite
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4p1st,well off pace,3w2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Headline News
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,settled in 4th,asked 3p2nd turn,failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Whenlovetakesover
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,3-2p2nd turn,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,2p1st,opened up,ins-2p2nd,ask1/4,headed3/16,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Nostalgic One
ENTRY.OWNER: Pletcher Todd A and Pletcher Joan
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,angled in,ins1st,settled,2p-ins2nd turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled in third,gain 3p2nd,bid1/4,lead ins3/16,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Swore
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3p1st,settled,roused 2p2nd turn,willingly,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Locke and Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,stalked outside,empty 1/2-mile pole,stopped,eased,vannd off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 37000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVIL'S CAY broke out at the start bumping and squeezing back GINNSU WARRIOR in tandem with pressure outside in MAKAR and a pair of rivals to his outside, came under hustling and showed the way in hand just off the inside before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing just outside the quarter pole, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and edged clear through the final furlong to prevail. PLAYINGWITHMATCHES chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking three wide through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and ran on to secure the place honors between foes at the end. MOVING PICTURES bobbled at the break, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued two to three wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. PRESSURE broke in at the start and was corrected, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and was in behind the leader with no clear path albeit being urged along, attempted to tip out but could not due to the presence of PLAYINGWITHMATCHES, got clearance late as the leader edged away and ran on for the last major share. SCOTTO bobbled at the start and was bumped between foes conceding three lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. MAKAR broke in bumping GINNSU WARRIOR back in tandem with DEVIL'S CRY, then got bumped between foes himself conceding about two lengths to the front, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and tired. COPPER CHALICE hustled from the gate, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. GINNSU WARRIOR broke out at the start and was bumped between rivals and squeezed back conceding three lengths to the front before being able to settle into stride, chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. DADS GOOD RUNNER broke in at the start and bumped SCOTTO into MAKAR against pressure inside from DEVIL'S CRY, chased four then three wide under coaxing from midway on the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Cay
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, hustled st, in hand 2p, ins turn, cut corner, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Ginnsu Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, bumped, squeezed st, chased ins, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Makar
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, bump btw st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble, bumped betw st, chased 3-2w, 6w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Dads Good Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pressure
ENTRY.OWNER: Baccari Racing Stable LLC and Prince Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, cut corner, beh foe, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Moving Pictures
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Playingwithmatches
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Manila S. - Grade3 BELMONT PARK RACE 9 1M Turf CR: 103. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $250 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,250 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,250 to start. For hors es not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,250 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to f ourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake or two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or State-bred allowance allowed 4 lbs. The fi rst four finishers of the Manila will have all fees waived if they start in the Grade Two National Museum of Racing Hall of Fame Stakes in Saratoga on August 4th. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, June 24, 2023 with 26 Nom
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE THAN LOOKS broke a step slow, settled at the rear of the field, was roused in the two path on the turn, moved to the three path late on that bend, shifted out while asked for his best in upper stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong, closed fast on the embattled leaders into the final sixteenth and got up under good handling. TALK OF THE NATION went to the front, showed the way on the inside of a rival while in hand, dropped from the two path to the rail under coaxing on the turn, was asked for more near the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage to NAGIRROC at the quarter-pole then came out under a left-handed crop and brushed with that opponent into upper stretch, fought on well while dueling inside of the aforementioned foe into the final sixteenth, gamely bested that foe for the place but was overtaken by the winner. NAGIRROC prompted the pace on the outside under restraint, drew even with the leader in the three path on the turn, took a narrow advantage at the quarter-pole then brushed with a foe while in the four path coming to the three-sixteenths, dueled outside of the runner-up into the final sixteenth and was also overtaken while just missing the place. MAJOR DUDE was well placed just off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path, was given his cue outside the five-sixteenths and came up empty. DREAMING OF KONA broke in and bumped with a foe then was pulled off that rival with a tug of the right rein, tracked the pace on the outside, dropped back in the four path on the turn and capitulated. BELOUNI (FR) was bumped at the start and forced in then taken up, raced under very stout restraint while tugging hard on the bit, advanced quickly when removed from cover outside the half-mile pole, gained to make a bid into the turn, bore out from the five path to the eight path going around that bend and had nothing left. AMSTRONG was hustled from the gate then settled towards the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Amstrong
ENTRY.OWNER: Soldi Stable LLC and Ohana Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled,ins-2path turn,no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: pace ins foe,in hand,2p-ins turn,headed1/4,fought on well,missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,settled at rear,ask 2-3p trn,mvd out3/16,rallied,up

ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt outside,in hand,3p turn,lead1/4,dueled past1/16,outfinishd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 10 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 82. Maiden Claiming Purse 55000. INNER TURF (UP TO $9,570 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $75,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 27 feet ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAMOND STATUS four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, dug in and held safe from a late challenge to the finish. FREEDOM FOR ALL saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out seven wide into upper stretch and closed well to latch on the aforementioned foe as she hit the wire. VOLATILITY broke out at the start bumping MEOW MEOW HISS, chased just off the inside down the backstretch until tucking to the inside half a mile from home, continued along the inside through the turn, got set down angled four wide into upper stretch, tipped out four to five paths nearing the eighth pole and offered up a good finish to secure the show honors. WHISKEY LULLABY five to six paths off the inside through the dog legged turn into the backstretch, tucked four wide and took over command inside the seven-eighths and showed the way down the backstretch, tucked three then two wide through the far turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was collared just inside the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the last major share. FINANCIAL ADVICE (FR) three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. MEOW MEOW HISS got bumped at the start by VOLATILITY, who broke outwards, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. KATIE'S CHECKRIDE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the late going. CANT KEEP ME DOWN four wide into the backstretch, darted inside when seeing an opening to do so five furlongs from home, rode the rail through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and offered no kick. WICKSIEPIXIE chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. DON'T TELL AMY chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom for All
ENTRY.OWNER: Harold Lerner LLC AWC Stables Nehoc Stables and Team Stallion
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, closed well
